DOC.brief_summary: The aim project evaluate effectiveness multidimensional pharmaceutical care plan improve compliance among elderly polypharmacy user community pharmacy setting . The specific objective project determine effect pharmaceutical care program medication adherence persistence among elderly polypharmacy user .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Compliance Among Elderly Polypharmacy Users Through Community Pharmacy Based Pharmaceutical Care Program
DOC.criteria: Both men woman age 65 year take 2 drug Inhabitants nurse home People receive unit dose dispense medicine
